name: Cowpoke
description:
Made for GMC Gamejam 47 "Hazardous Environments". 
Lift your boots and make the walk to wherever yer goin' in style. 
Don't step on a cactus or else you'll die immediately of pain and embarrassment.

This game is currently being worked on further! Few things wrong with this build at the moment, but I wanted to get the page set up to show off how far it's come. Coming soon will be an HP system & checkpoints. Further along will be more levels, obstacles, types of boots & some fun surprises. Thank you so much to the Gamemaker Community for inspiring this game with their jam. Thank you to all who have played it and given us  your feedback.
